title: 2.1 Syncing Your Wallet
description: Matter DeFi Core is one of the auxiliary dApps the make up the SalsaDAO ecosystem. Matter DeFi itself is a farming platform that incentivizes providing liquidity to Spicyswap. By staking Spicyswap SSLP (Spicyswap LP tokens), liquidity providers are rewarded in $MTTR tokens by staking their SSLP in one of the Matter farms.
